snippet: Four teams in the N.B.A.’s Western Conference are chasing 50-win seasons, but there are only three playoff berths available as the regular season winds down.
abstract: Four teams are chasing 50-win seasons in Western Conference, but there are only three playoff berths available as the regular season winds to close; sixth-place Golden State Warriors hold a one-and-a-half-game lead over the seventh-place Dallas Mavericks, who lead the Memphis Grizzlies and the Phoenix Suns by a half-game.
lead_paragraph: Four teams in the N.B.A.’s Western Conference are chasing 50-win seasons, but there are only three playoff berths available as the regular season winds down.

headline.main: Having Close to 50 Wins May Not Be Good Enough in West
headline.print_headline: Having Close to 50 Wins May Not Be Good Enough in West
